body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Management     Our Staff & Offices              Our Staff & Offices         Canaveral National Seashore Headquarters R. Shannon     Â    The Nation's treasured parks don't take care of themselves - it takes a team of professionals in diverse fields such as law enforcement, land management, storytelling, civil engineering and business administration (to name a few) to protect and preserve these places. Click on a link below for a brief look at Canaveral National Seashore's superb management team. title: Canaveral National Seashore: Our Staff & Offices
